|brand = Pandaboard.org |model = Panda Board |submodelappend = yes |submodel = ES |revision = Rev B1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TFB-TIWI1-01 |icid = 5969A-TIWI01 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;OMAP4460; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Elpida;EDB8064B1PB-8D-F; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN9514; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SDHC Card slot, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.3, DVI-D, Audio 3.5mm out, Mic (3.5mm), Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE), |addchip = Flat-panel Display Digital Transmitter;Texas Instruments;TFP410PAP;;1;,,, HDMI Companion Chip w/ Step-up DC-DC;Texas Instruments;TPD12S015A;;1;,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2054BD;;1;,,, USB 2.0 ULPI Transceiver;SMSC;USB3320;;1;,,, 400mA Low-Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TPS73633;;1;,,, Fully Integrated Power Management;Texas Instruments;TWL6030;;1;,,, 8-Channel Audio Codec;Texas Instruments;TWL6040;;1;,,, Single Low Power Voltage Detector;Texas Instruments;TPS3803;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;Texas Instruments;TXS0104E;;1;,,, USB Peripheral Power Management;Texas Instruments;TPS2141;;1;,,, 4.5V-17V Input, 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54320;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3232;;1;,,, 3A Processor Supply w/I2C Interface;Texas Instruments;TPS62361B;;1;,,, Low-Capacitance 6-Channel ESD-Protection;Texas Instruments;TPD6E001;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Solution for USB;Texas Instruments;TPD4S012;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SVtronics Inc |manuf_model = 750-2170-002 |manuf_rev = REV B |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/10/2010 |estreldate = 09/2011 |estprice = 182 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = LSR TiWi-BLE |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;WL1271L; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Texas Instruments]]'' OMAP 4460 @1.2GHz Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9 *RAM: 1GB DDR *Storage: SDHC Card Slot *GPU: PowerVR SGX540
==Links of Interest== [https://www.cs.utexas.edu/~simon/378/resources/PandaBoardES.pdf System Reference Manual]:[https://svtronics.com/index.php?route=product/download&product_document_id=315&product_id=22 Developers Guide]
